short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Chrome new tab with beautiful Lucid Tab Screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace Chrome new tab with beautiful Lucid Tab Screen. 

Features include
✓ Fully open source
✓ A choice of being presented with beautiful gradient colours or an shuffling image
✓ Presents you with different famous quotes for inspiration every tab
✓ Presents you with a new word, its definition and meaning (upon hovering) to learn
✓ Displays the local weather conditions
✓ Displays local time and date, along with a configurable username with different greeting messages throughout the day

Github Link
https://github.com/Thomasalex2/new_tab_chrome_extension
